actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 93-316.

official_title: Resolution waiving points of order against the bill H.R. 8877.  A bill making appropriations for the Departments of Labor and Health, Education and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.

summary.text: Provides that during the consideration of the bill (H.R. 8877) making appropriations for the Department of Labor, and Health, Education, and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974, the provisions of clause 2, rule XXI are hereby waived.

titles.title: Resolution waiving points of order against the bill H.R. 8877.  A bill making appropriations for the Departments of Labor and Health, Education and Welfare, and related agencies, for the fiscal year ending June 30, 1974.
